metadata.title: CVE-2024-36915 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nfc:llcp: fix nfc_llcp_setsockopt() unsafe copies syzbot reported unsafe callsto copy_from_sockptr() [1] Use copy_safe_from_sockptr() instead.
